name: Worn
description:
Worn is a full service, mission-based creative agency on a mission to help women succeed. Founded by Nicole Corbett, a Latina and first generation American, Worn defies all odds in the agency world. Not only is Worn female-owned and run, at a time when majority of agencies are led by men, but our VP of Creative, Carolyn Rush, is also a woman (when only 11% of Creative Directors at agencies are female).
Based in New York City, Worn has worked with over 75 female-led companies and teams since its inception in 2013. Worn empowers women to lead by offering entrepreneurs and Fortune 500 clients business strategy and creative services such as website design, product packaging, and branding -- most often working with female entrepreneurs and their teams. 
READ MORE...
